title: Kremlin Showcases Russia’s Parallel Realities in Marathon Putin Presser
description: “They decided to make it a mandatory program: No less than four hours of Putin live on air in good news incubator mode,” a source close to the Kremlin said.
artist: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia
album: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia

title: Zelensky Says EU Accession Talks ‘Victory for Ukraine'
description: The European Union decided to open accession negotiations with Ukraine and Moldova on Thursday.

title: EU Calls Orban’s Bluff and Strikes Deal To Open Ukraine Talks

title: Finland Shuts Russian Border Again Over Migrant Crossings
description: Helsinki canceled the plan to ease restrictions when migrants resumed entering the country immediately after restrictions were lifted.

title: Romania to Summon Russian Envoy Over Drone Crash
description: A crater was formed as the "result of an uncontrolled crash of a drone used in an attack on Ukrainian port infrastructure," Bucharest said.

title: Finland Mulls New Border Closure With Russia – Reports

title: Putin ‘Hopes’ Moscow, Washington Will Find Solution on Arrested U.S. Citizens
description: On Thursday, a Moscow court upheld a ruling to hold journalist Evan Gershkovich, arrested this year on espionage charges, in detention until January.
artist: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia

title: Putin Says Over 600K Russian Soldiers Currently in Ukraine

title: ‘Why Is Your ‘Reality’ Different From Ours?’ – Viewers Challenge Putin at Press Conference

title: Ex-Rebel Leader Girkin Faces Extremism Charges in Moscow
description: Igor Girkin, who has declared his intention of challenging Putin in the presidential election next March, faces up to five years in prison.

title: Russia Upholds Detention of WSJ Reporter Gershkovich – Court

title: Russia Says Downed 9 Ukrainian Drones Near Moscow

title: Russia Puts Ukraine’s Army Spy Chief on ‘Wanted’ List

title: World Olympic Body Shortens List of Russian Neutral Athletes Cleared for Paris Games
